NoFileToUpload: Nothing to upload, select a file or use default
XSLFileError: Xsl version should be 1.0, modify file or use default
ProcessError: Error during process, try again later
DateDescription: When checked, the Date criteria will be enabled
UnitDescription: When checked, the Unit criteria will be enabled
StaticMappingDescription: When checked, Product Configuration instantiation will be enabled when authoring and interpreted when exploring the structure
CompositionMatrixDescription: When checked, the Composition Matrix will be enabled and interpreted when filtering the structure
